thread.title: Salman Khan: No one could change me to Prem better than Sooraj Barjatiya
thread.title_full: Salman Khan: No one could change me to Prem better than Sooraj Barjatiya - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Salman Khan: No one could change me to Prem better than Sooraj Barjatiya
text:
Salman Khan , who is mostly remembered as his own self rather than his onscreen persona, is returning in his most-loved character 'Prem' in Sooraj Barjatiya's 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo' and credits the director for the change.*Salman Khan and Sooraj Barjatiya*
"When you will watch me as Prem on the screen, you would definitely ... Â»
